mapper.insert: insert into grouphub.comment(commentAuthor, commentContent, commentParentId, commentRateId, commentCreateTime, isDeleted) value (#{commentAuthor}, #{commentContent}, #{commentParentId}, #{commentRateId}, #{commentCreateTime}, #{isDeleted});
mapper.select: select count(commentId) from grouphub.comment where commentRateId = #{commentRateId};
